title: Jon Hamm Is Still Trying to Forget He Went to Donald Trump’s SNL Party
text:
You can’t blame Jon Hamm too much for stumbling upon the party Donald Trump threw for himself when he hosted SNL back in 2015. He had just seen Hamilton. He was feeling patriotic. He also … had zero idea Trump was that week’s host, which sucks, especially for this noted lover of topical comedy. “I had forgotten who the host was, because that host became the 45th president of the United States. He and his buddy Bill O’Reilly were there,” Hamm recalled on The Late Show. “He did the thing, where he shakes your hand and pulls you to try to get you off balance. I’m 6’2 and 220 on a good day, you’re not gonna get me off my pins.” The canapés? The drinks? The other disgraced hosts? Who knows. “I didn’t stay at the party very long.”
